title: I leveled up but my champion capsule is missing
body: I leveled up from 14-15 but my champion capsule is missing I've tried restarting the client but it wont work. help me please

replies.body:
If it hasn't showed up in an hour or two I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
